compat_notice.message: New Tab Override was developed from the ground up as so-called WebExtension. This makes New Tab Override compatible with Firefox 57 and later. Not all options of the previous version are currently available as WebExtension. As soon as Mozilla implements support for missing functionalities in Firefox, they will be integrated in a future update of New Tab Override.

extension_description.message: Toś ten dodank pśinjaso funkciju slědk, bok změniś, kótaryž so pśi wócynjanju nowego rejtarka pokazujo.

introduction_part_one.message: Toś ten bok staja se k dispoziciji wót

introduction_part_two.message: Wubjeŕśo, kótary bok ma se ako nowy rejtark wócyniś!

omnibox_default_description.message: New Tab Override brings back the ability to change the page which is shown when opening a new tab

review_text.message: Dodank se wam spódoba? Ga zawóstajśo pógódnośenje na

settings_donation_text.message: Pšosym rozwažujśo dar, aby dalšne wuwijanje toś togo dodanka pódpěrał.

settings_feed_permission_description.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You can revoke this permission at any time.

settings_feed_permission_needed.message: To use this feature you have to allow Firefox to access the data source.

settings_feed_permission_revoke_descript.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You have already granted this permission.

url_description.message: Toś ten bok se pokazujo, gaž se nowy rejtark wócynja a se opcija „swójski URL“ wuběra.
